director.name: 索尼娅·洛维特 Sonia Lovett
弗兰克·舍费尔 Frank Scheffer

introduction: Early year in Minguo period, Jiao Yenwang murders for gain. Chou Hu is put into jail by wrong judge, and is separated painfully with Jinzi. In the mean time, Jinzi is forced to merry to Jiao Daxin, the son of Jian Yenwang. Jinzi was tortured a lot by Mother Jiao since then. Chou Hu escapes successful from prison 10 years later. He wants to kill Jia Yenwang for revenge. But Jiao Yenwang is dead earlier when he is still in jail. The strong love pulls Chou Hu and Jinzi happy together again. Jiao Daxin and Chou Hu became rivals in love. Jinzi falls into sentimental trap. Chou Hu kills the innocent Jiao Daxin without respecting their old friendship and the preventing from Jinzi for his personal revenge. However, Chou Hu suicides on the endless escaped life later. Jinzi has no choice, but keeps hopes and moves herself on the rest of lonely life.
